comments:

Oh-la-la, since it is working now, I can only assume that I had selected a wrong project before (if this can cause this "problem"). I.e. not a web project. However, from the usability's point of view it may be desirable to either not be able to select servlet than in the first place? Or, less nice, but at least clarifying the situation, a warning that this is not allowed?
